Docs.summary: The namespace provides classes that enable you to filter data in a Web page by using the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This namespace contains expressions that are used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control to filter data in a Web page using declarative syntax. The classes in this namespace include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.PropertyExpression?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.CustomExpression?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
